title: Tennis-Federer upset by Australian Kokkinakis in Miami
text: March 24, 2018 / 10:15 PM / Updated an hour ago Tennis-Federer upset by Australian Kokkinakis in Miami Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 24 (Reuters) - Roger Federer suffered a shock defeat by Thanasi Kokkinakis at the Miami Open as the Australian beat the world number one 3-6 6-3 7-6(4) in the second round on Saturday. It was the second loss in six days for the Swiss champion, who was beaten by Juan Martin del Potro in the Indian Wells final. Kokkinakis, ranked 175th in the world, used a vicious top-spin forehand to wear down Federer and claim an upset victory in front of a stunned near-capacity crowd. (Reporting by Andrew Both in Cary, North Carolina, editing by Ed Osmond)
